maqras.text: 54|9|krom nuo h ban bdeseth moun puokke( areab kou r sh)  haey puok  ke ban bdeseth nung khnhom robsa yeung( nuo h)  ning ban niyeay tha ke  chea mnoussaavikl chrit  haey ke trauv ban ke koumream themtiet .
54|10|pelnoh ke( nuo h) kaban buongsuong som pi mcheasa robsa ke tha  pitabrakd nasa  khnhom asamotthaphap haey  dau che  neah saum trong me tda chuoy  dl khnhom phng .
54|11|dau che  neah  yeung kaban baekatvear mekh daoy banghourtuk phlieng  cheachraen .

54|12|haey yeung ban thveu aoy phendei b po  ch nh nouv braphp tukchea chraen  pelnoh tuk kaban chuobaknea( tukathleak pileu mekh  ning tuk del chenh  pi dei) towteam phenkar delke ban kamnt da pitabrakd .
54|13|haey yeung ban sangkroh ke aoy chiah leu saampow del thveuampi kdar  ning dekkol
54|14|del vea thveudamnaer tam kar khleameul robsa yeung kuchea kar  tabasnang champoh anak del trauv ban ke brachheang( nuo h) .

54|15|haey chea karpit nasa   yeung ban bansaoltouk vea(rueng  robsa nuo h) chea phosdo tang muoy( banhcheak pi samotthaphap robsa yeung  samreab mnoussa lok) .  dau che  neah  tae mean anaknea yk thveuchea merien der ryyte
54|16|dau che  neah  tae tearounakamm robsa yeung  ning karopromean robsa yeung  yeang dauch me  d ch der
54|17|haey pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban thveu aoy kompir kuor an mean  kar ngeayosruol samreab kar changcham .  dau che  neah  tae mean anak del yk thveu  chea merien der ryyte
54|18|krom a d ban bdeseth( nung anakneasar robsa puokke) .  dau che  neah  tae tearounakamm robsa yeung  ning karopromean robsa yeung yeangdauch  me  d ch der
54|19|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban banhchoun khyalpyouh da trachak bk  baok towleu puokke yeang khlang now thngai m h nd reay chea b nd banteab .
54|20|khyalpyouh ban kuoch yk mnoussaalok  puokke hakbeidauchchea  kl lmeu del r leung chenhpi dei .
54|21|dau che  neah  tae tearounakamm robsa yeung  ning karopromean robsa yeung  yeang dauch me  d ch der
54|22|haey pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban thveu aoy kompir kuor an mean  kar ngeayosruol samreab kar changcham .  dau che  neah  tae mean anak del yk thveu  chea merien der ryyte
54|23|krom sa mou d ban bdeseth nung kardasatuen promean .

54|24|haey puokke ban niyeay tha  tae puok yeung tam ke del chea  mnoussa mneak knongchamnaom puok yeung ryy?  bae dauchnaoh men  puok yeung pitchea  sthet knong pheap v nge  vng  ning vikalochrit cheaminkhan .
54|25|tae ke banhchouh vea hi aoy ke( sa leh) daoy romlng puok yeung ryy? phtoytowvinh  ke chea mnoussa phout kohk  ning amnuot ke  a ng kaang .
54|26|puokke kngte nung doeng now thngaikheangmoukh( thngai barlok) tha  anaknea chea anak phout kohk ning chea anak del uotang noh .
54|27|pitabrakd nasa  yeung chea anak del banhchoun satv audth nhi muoy  kbal( chenhpi thm) daembi chea karsaakalbong puokke .  dau che  neah chaur anak rngcham  meul puokke  ning atthmot choh .

54|28|haey chaur anak brab puokke tha  pitabrakd nasa tuk ( andaung) noh ku trauv ban ke bengchek rveang puokke( muoyothngai samreab  satv audth  muoyothngai samreab puokke) .  real pel trauv phoek ku trauv mk  tam ven .
54|29|te( puokke min sokh chetd)  puokke ban haw mi td phokde robsa puok  ke mneak  haey ke ban yk dav  ruoch ka saamleh satv audth noh .
54|30|dau che  neah  tae tearounakamm  ning karopromean robsa yeung yeangdauch  me  d ch der
54|31|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban banhchoun samrek muoy yeang khlang  towleu puokke  pelnoh puokke brieb dauchchea roukkhcheate snguot delke dak  knong kraol samreab satvapahn sai .
54|32|haey pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban thveu aoy kompir kuor an mean  kar ngeayosruol samreab kar changcham .  dau che  neah  tae mean anak del yk thveu  chea merien der ryyte
54|33|krom robsa lout ban bdeseth nung kardasatuen promean .

54|34|pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban banhchoun khyalpyouh noam dom thm tomleak  leu puokke teangoasa  leuklengte krom kruosaear robsa lout( anak del  ruom chomnue cheamuoy keat)bonnaoh  del yeung ban sangkroh puokke now  velea moun tiebaphlu .
54|35|chea nie k meat pi yeung .  dauchnaoh der  yeung tabasnang champoh  anaknea del ban doengkoun .
54|36|haey chea karpit nasa  ke( lout) ban dasatuen promean  puokke pi tondakamm robsa yeung  te puokke bercha bdeseth nung kar  dasatuen promean noh towvinh .

54|37|haey chea karpit nasa  puokke ban luonglom ke( lout)  som kar ruomrk cheamuoy phnhiev robsa ke .  kraoyomk yeung thveu aoy phnek  robsa puokke ngngut  haey( yeung ban mean bantoul towkean puokke tha)  chaur puok anak phloksa nouv tearounakamm  ning karopromean robsa yeung choh .
54|38|haey chea karpit nasa  tearounakamm chea ni r nd  ban thleak leu  puokke teang prukaproheam .
54|39|dau che  neah  chaur puokke phloksa tearounakamm  ning karopromean robsa yeung  choh .
54|40|haey pitabrakd nasa  yeung ban thveu aoy kompir kuor an mean  kar ngeayosruol samreab kar changcham .  dau che  neah  tae mean anak del yk  thveuchea merien der ryyte
54|41|haey chea karpit nasa  kardasatuen promean ban mokadl  vongsaotrakaul robsa hvie r aon .
54|42|puokke ban bdeseth nung phosdo tang robsa yeung teangoasa .  haey yeung ban dak tearounakamm puokke nouv tearounakamm robsa anak del  mha khlangokla  mha mean anoupheap .

54|43|tae kar brachheang robsa puok anak( areab kou r sh) brasaer cheang  puok brachheang moun   ryy muoy ka puok anak meankar theanea( aoy ruochphot pi tearoun- kamm robsa a l laoh) nowknong kompir moun  ryy
54|44|ryy muoy puokke niyeay tha  puok yeung teangoasaknea  kuchea anak  chhneah
54|45|puokke teangoasa nung trauv breachy  haey rt tralb kraoy  cheaminkhan .
54|46|phtoytowvinh  kalkamnt nei thngai barlok kuchea karosanyea ( thveutearounakamm)puokke  haey kalkamnt nei thngai barlok  ku chhucheab  ning lvingchourocht bamphot .
54|47|pitabrakd nasa  puok del br pru td babakamm ku sthet knong pheap  v nge  vng  ning sthet knong nork del chabcheh santhosanthow .
54|48|now thngai del puokke trauv ke ausa phkabmoukh tow knong nork . ( mean ke niyeay towkean puokke tha)  chaur puok anak phloksa nouv rosacheate nei  phleung nork nih choh .
54|49|pitabrakd nasa  real avei  teangoasa yeung ban bangkeut vea  daoy mean kamnt  ruoch chea se  r ch .
54|50|haey batobanhchea robsa yeung( towkean aveimuoy)  ku kreante  yeung pol peakyamuoymeat( vea nung kaetlaeng phleam)dauchchea muoy  bbrechaphnek bonnaoh .
54|51|haey chea karpit nasa  yeung ban bamphlanh puok del ban  brachheang dauch puok anak .  dau che  neah  tae mean anaknea yk thveuchea merien der  ryyte
54|52|haey real avei  del puokke ban br pru td vea  ku sthetnow knong  sievphow kamntheto( lav ho l mah hvou sa) .
54|53|haey real kechchakar tauch  ning thom ku trauv ke kttra .
54|54|pitabrakd nasa  banda anak del kaotakhlach a l laoh ku  sthetnow knong thansuokr  ning mean t ne  l cheachraen
54|55|del sthetnow kanleng sachch kber mcheasa del meanamnach mean  anoupheap bamphot .
